description:
My place is close to Chelsea Market, Shake Shack, Westville Chelsea, Tao Downtown, Union Square. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Spacious studio with full bath in a luxury building located in downtown Chelsea.  Pet-free home that is clean, (self-proclaimed OCD resident!).   Personal apartment occupied by just myself. 

Center of everything! Right off 6th Ave, across the street from Trader Joe's

You'll have access to the entire unit, except for the walk-in closet which will be locked.  However, you'll have access to hangers and hooks for your clothes.

I'm available by text daily.

Steps to everything. Heart of Chelsea!

2 blocks from B,D,F,M & PATH trains. 2 blocks from 1 train. 

Cabs everywhere and Citibike in front of building!
name: Studio in beautiful Chelsea - close to everything!
